name: Bstorm
description:
We are Bstorm - a full-service mobile development agency that develops and turns your ideas into successful, custom-made solutions. Driven by the team of development geniuses, we are centered around the development, placing on a market and stay-ahead a competition process.
As a product-driven app-development agency that works with a range of international world-wide famous clients and big brands such as The Coca-Cola Company, Deloitte, Societe Generale Bank, we strive to create compelling, successful, innovative apps based on the latest technologies.Â
